pages.text: This turret is a little more advanced, and throws snowballs at enemies. This turret shoots a little bit slower than the base one. $(br)Attributes: $(li)Can only be created with a $(l:growth_controller)Growth Controller$(/l) upgraded at $(l:tier2_upgrade)tier 2$(/l).$(li)Throws bullets that slows down enemies

pages.name: Snow Turret
pages.text: If this plant wanted to kill you, it could do it slowly, as you will be stuck in snow.
